Package com.worldbiomusic.minigameworld.api

Class MiniGameWorld

java.lang.Object
com.worldbiomusic.minigameworld.api.MiniGameWorld
public class MiniGameWorld extends Object
MiniGameWorld plugin API

    Field
    Description

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static boolean
    checkCompatibleVersion​(String version)
    Check version is compatible with API
    boolean
    checkPlayerIsPlayingMiniGame​(org.bukkit.entity.Player p)
    Checks a player is playing any minigame
    static MiniGameWorld
    create​(String version)
    MiniGameWorld singleton instance

    Version format: <MAJOR>.<MINOR>.<PATCH>
    MAJOR: not change
    MINOR: API changed
    PATCH: logic, bug, error fixed

    Version is only compatible with the same "MINOR" version, different "PATCH" version is permit
    - "1.0.0" and 1.0.5" is compatible for different "PATCH"
    - "1.0.0" and 1.1.5" is NOT compatible for different "MINOR"

    Current API version: MiniGameWorld.VERSION
    void
    createException​(org.bukkit.entity.Player p, MiniGame.Exception exception)
    Sends exception to minigame

    registerMiniGame​(MiniGame newGame)
    Registers new minigame to MiniGameWorld plugin
    The Same class name minigame can't be registered in the same server
    void
    registerMiniGameObserver​(MiniGameObserver observer)
    Registers minigame observer
    [IMPORTANT] Observer must be registered with MiniGameManager, not directly with MiniGame (only MiniGameManager can register to all minigames)
    - Can reserve task with MiniGameEventNotifier.MiniGameEvent
    void
    setMiniGameManager​(MiniGameManager minigameM)

    void
    unregisterMiniGameObserver​(MiniGameObserver observer)
    Unregisters minigame observer
    [IMPORTANT] Observer must be registered with MiniGameManager, not directly with MiniGame (only MiniGameManager can register to all minigames)

  • Field Details

    • API_VERSION

      public static final String API_VERSION
      MiniGameWorld API version

  • Method Details

    • create

      public static MiniGameWorld create​(String version)
      MiniGameWorld singleton instance

      Version format: <MAJOR>.<MINOR>.<PATCH>
      MAJOR: not change
      MINOR: API changed
      PATCH: logic, bug, error fixed

      Version is only compatible with the same "MINOR" version, different "PATCH" version is permit
      - "1.0.0" and 1.0.5" is compatible for different "PATCH"
      - "1.0.0" and 1.1.5" is NOT compatible for different "MINOR"

      Current API version: MiniGameWorld.VERSION
      Parameters:
      version - Using version
      Returns:
      True if version is compatible

    • checkCompatibleVersion

      public static boolean checkCompatibleVersion​(String version)
      Check version is compatible with API
      Parameters:
      version - Using version
      Returns:
      True if compatible

    • setMiniGameManager

      public void setMiniGameManager​(MiniGameManager minigameM)
      Set MiniGameManager only once when plugin loaded automatically by MiniGameWorld plugin
      Parameters:
      minigameM - MiniGameManager

    • joinGame

      public void joinGame​(org.bukkit.entity.Player p, String title)
      Join player to minigame
      Parameters:
      p - Player who treis to join
      title - MiniGame title

      public void leaveGame​(org.bukkit.entity.Player p)
      Leave player from playing minigame
      Parameters:
      p - Player who tries to leave

    • createException

      public void createException​(org.bukkit.entity.Player p, MiniGame.Exception exception)
      Sends exception to minigame
      Parameters:
      p - Playing minigame player
      exception - Exception to send

      Can check specific event can be detected
      Returns:
      Instance

    • checkPlayerIsPlayingMiniGame

      public boolean checkPlayerIsPlayingMiniGame​(org.bukkit.entity.Player p)
      Checks a player is playing any minigame
      Parameters:
      p - Target player
      Returns:
      True if player is playing any minigame

    • getMiniGameWithClassName

      public MiniGameAccessor getMiniGameWithClassName​(String className)
      Gets MiniGameAccessor with class name
      Parameters:
      className - Minigame class name
      Returns:
      Null if class name minigame not exist

    • getPlayingMiniGame

      public MiniGameAccessor getPlayingMiniGame​(org.bukkit.entity.Player p)
      Gets player's playing minigame
      Parameters:
      p - Playing minigame
      Returns:
      Null if player is not playing any minigame

    • getMiniGameList

      public List<MiniGameAccessor> getMiniGameList()
      Gets minigame list
      Returns:
      MiniGameAccessor list

    • registerMiniGame

      public boolean registerMiniGame​(MiniGame newGame)
      Registers new minigame to MiniGameWorld plugin
      The Same class name minigame can't be registered in the same server
      Parameters:
      newGame - Minigame to register
      Returns:
      False if same class name minigame already exists

    • unregisterMiniGame

      public boolean unregisterMiniGame​(MiniGame minigame)
      Unregisters minigame from server
      Parameters:
      minigame - Minigame to unregister
      Returns:
      False if not exist

    • registerMiniGameObserver

      public void registerMiniGameObserver​(MiniGameObserver observer)
      Registers minigame observer
      [IMPORTANT] Observer must be registered with MiniGameManager, not directly with MiniGame (only MiniGameManager can register to all minigames)
      - Can reserve task with MiniGameEventNotifier.MiniGameEvent
      Parameters:
      observer - Observer to register

    • unregisterMiniGameObserver

      public void unregisterMiniGameObserver​(MiniGameObserver observer)
      Unregisters minigame observer
      [IMPORTANT] Observer must be registered with MiniGameManager, not directly with MiniGame (only MiniGameManager can register to all minigames)
      Parameters:
      observer - Observer to unregister

    • openMiniGameMenu

      public org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory openMiniGameMenu​(org.bukkit.entity.Player p)
      Opens Menu GUI
      - Can edit Menu with returned inventory instance
      Parameters:
      p - Player to show menu
      Returns:
      Menu GUI invenotry instance

    • getPartyManager

      public PartyManager getPartyManager()
      Gets Party Manager
      - Can change party access methods (e.g. Right-Click player to ask)
      Returns:
      PartyManager
